actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The shark makes two Bite attacks.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: _Melee Weapon Attack:_ +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. _Hit:_ 12 (2d8+3) piercing damage.

special_abilities.name: Blood Frenzy
special_abilities.desc: The shark has advantage on melee attack rolls against any creature that doesn't have all its HP.

special_abilities.name: Blood Sense
special_abilities.desc: The shark can pinpoint, by scent, the location of creatures that don't have all of their HP within 60 feet of it and can sense the general direction of such creatures within 1 mile of it.

special_abilities.name: Electrical Sensitivity
special_abilities.desc: Whenever the shark takes lightning damage, it must succeed on a DC 12 CON save or be incapacitated until the end of its next turn.

special_abilities.name: Water Breathing
special_abilities.desc: The shark can breathe only underwater.
